Quote.Author: Ronald Reagan
Quote.QuoteValue: Trust, but verify

Quote.Author: Ronald Reagan
Quote.QuoteValue: Government's first duty is to protect the people, not run their lives

Quote.Author: Ronald Reagan
Quote.QuoteValue: Recession is when a neighbor loses his job. Depression is when you lose yours

Quote.Author: Ronald Reagan
Quote.QuoteValue: I've often said there's nothing better for the inside of a man than the outside of a horse

Quote.Author: Ronald Reagan
Quote.QuoteValue: We are never defeated unless we give up on God

Quote.Author: Rumi
Quote.QuoteValue: Let the beauty of what you love be what you do

Quote.Author: Rumi
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything that is made beautiful and fair and lovely is made for the eye of one who sees

Quote.Author: Rumi
Quote.QuoteValue: Beauty surrounds us, but usually we need to be walking in a garden to know it

Quote.Author: Rumi
Quote.QuoteValue: We are born of love; Love is our mother

Quote.Author: Rumi
Quote.QuoteValue: May this marriage be full of laughter, our every day in paradise

Quote.Author: Rumi
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't grieve. Anything you lose comes round in another form

Quote.Author: Rumi
Quote.QuoteValue: Woman is a ray of God. She is not that earthly beloved: she is creative, not created

Quote.Author: Rumi
Quote.QuoteValue: Your depression is connected to your insolence and refusal to praise

Quote.Author: Rumi
Quote.QuoteValue: May these vows and this marriage be blessed

Quote.Author: Rumi
Quote.QuoteValue: Why should I be unhappy? Every parcel of my being is in full bloom

Quote.Author: Saint Augustine
Quote.QuoteValue: Patience is the companion of wisdom

Quote.Author: Saint Augustine
Quote.QuoteValue: The world is a book, and those who do not travel read only a page

Quote.Author: Saint Augustine
Quote.QuoteValue: It was pride that changed angels into devils; it is humility that makes men as angels

Quote.Author: Saint Augustine
Quote.QuoteValue: Faith is to believe what you do not see; the reward of this faith is to see what you believe

Quote.Author: Saint Augustine
Quote.QuoteValue: Pray as though everything depended on God. Work as though everything depended on you

Quote.Author: Saint Augustine
Quote.QuoteValue: The greatest evil is physical pain

Quote.Author: Saint Augustine
Quote.QuoteValue: He that is jealous is not in love

Quote.Author: Saint Augustine
Quote.QuoteValue: Seek not to understand that you may believe, but believe that you may understand

Quote.Author: Saint Augustine
Quote.QuoteValue: God judged it better to bring good out of evil than to suffer no evil to exist

Quote.Author: Saint Augustine
Quote.QuoteValue: Thou hast created us for Thyself, and our heart is not quiet until it rests in Thee

Quote.Author: Salvador Dali
Quote.QuoteValue: Intelligence without ambition is a bird without wings

Quote.Author: Salvador Dali
Quote.QuoteValue: Drawing is the honesty of the art. There is no possibility of cheating. It is either good or bad

Quote.Author: Salvador Dali
Quote.QuoteValue: Have no fear of perfection - you'll never reach it

Quote.Author: Salvador Dali
Quote.QuoteValue: The thermometer of success is merely the jealousy of the malcontents

Quote.Author: Salvador Dali
Quote.QuoteValue: Each morning when I awake, I experience again a supreme pleasure - that of being Salvador Dali

Quote.Author: Salvador Dali
Quote.QuoteValue: The only difference between me and a madman is that I'm not mad

Quote.Author: Salvador Dali
Quote.QuoteValue: There are some days when I think I'm going to die from an overdose of satisfaction

Quote.Author: Salvador Dali
Quote.QuoteValue: Those who do not want to imitate anything, produce nothing

Quote.Author: Salvador Dali
Quote.QuoteValue: Let my enemies devour each other

Quote.Author: Salvador Dali
Quote.QuoteValue: I seated ugliness on my knee, and almost immediately grew tired of it

Quote.Author: Samuel Johnson
Quote.QuoteValue: Great works are performed not by strength but by perseverance

Quote.Author: Samuel Johnson
Quote.QuoteValue: Kindness is in our power, even when fondness is not

Quote.Author: Samuel Johnson
Quote.QuoteValue: My dear friend, clear your mind of cant

Quote.Author: Samuel Johnson
Quote.QuoteValue: Agriculture not only gives riches to a nation, but the only riches she can call her own

Quote.Author: Samuel Johnson
Quote.QuoteValue: Self-confidence is the first requisite to great undertakings

Quote.Author: Samuel Johnson
Quote.QuoteValue: Revenge is an act of passion; vengeance of justice. Injuries are revenged; crimes are avenged

Quote.Author: Samuel Johnson
Quote.QuoteValue: The true measure of a man is how he treats someone who can do him absolutely no good

Quote.Author: Samuel Johnson
Quote.QuoteValue: Praise, like gold and diamonds, owes its value only to its scarcity

Quote.Author: Samuel Johnson
Quote.QuoteValue: When making your choice in life, do not neglect to live

Quote.Author: Samuel Johnson
Quote.QuoteValue: I look upon every day to be lost, in which I do not make a new acquaintance

Quote.Author: Sigmund Freud
Quote.QuoteValue: We are never so defensless against suffering as when we love

Quote.Author: Sigmund Freud
Quote.QuoteValue: I cannot think of any need in childhood as strong as the need for a father's protection

Quote.Author: Sigmund Freud
Quote.QuoteValue: Time spent with cats is never wasted

Quote.Author: Sigmund Freud
Quote.QuoteValue: Flowers are restful to look at. They have neither emotions nor conflicts

Quote.Author: Sigmund Freud
Quote.QuoteValue: Dreams are often most profound when they seem the most crazy

Quote.Author: Sigmund Freud
Quote.QuoteValue: The ego is not master in its own house

Quote.Author: Sigmund Freud
Quote.QuoteValue: Being entirely honest with oneself is a good exercise

Quote.Author: Sigmund Freud
Quote.QuoteValue: The mind is like an iceberg, it floats with one-seventh of its bulk above water

Quote.Author: Sigmund Freud
Quote.QuoteValue: The voice of the intellect is a soft one, but it does not rest until it has gained a hearing

Quote.Author: Sigmund Freud
Quote.QuoteValue: Love and work are the cornerstones of our humanness

Quote.Author: Simon Sinek
Quote.QuoteValue: Leadership is not about the next election, it's about the next generation

Quote.Author: Simon Sinek
Quote.QuoteValue: Leadership is a way of thinking, a way of acting and, most importantly, a way of communicating

Quote.Author: Simon Sinek
Quote.QuoteValue: I find, when you're an optimist, life has a funny way of looking after you

Quote.Author: Simon Sinek
Quote.QuoteValue: Leadership is absolutely about inspiring action, but it is also about guarding against mis-action

Quote.Author: Simon Sinek
Quote.QuoteValue: Directions are instructions given to explain how. Direction is a vision offered to explain why

Quote.Author: Simon Sinek
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no decision that we can make that doesn't come with some sort of balance or sacrifice

Quote.Author: Simon Sinek
Quote.QuoteValue: The quality of a leader cannot be judged by the answers he gives, but by the questions he asks

Quote.Author: Simon Sinek
Quote.QuoteValue: People don't buy what you do, they buy why you do it

Quote.Author: Simon Sinek
Quote.QuoteValue: The most basic human desire is to feel like you belong. Fitting in is important

Quote.Author: Simon Sinek
Quote.QuoteValue: Nike doesn't want to make products for everyone - they want to make products for champions

Quote.Author: Socrates
Quote.QuoteValue: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing

Quote.Author: Socrates
Quote.QuoteValue: I know that I am intelligent, because I know that I know nothing

Quote.Author: Socrates
Quote.QuoteValue: Our prayers should be for blessings in general, for God knows best what is good for us

Quote.Author: Socrates
Quote.QuoteValue: The greatest way to live with honor in this world is to be what we pretend to be

Quote.Author: Socrates
Quote.QuoteValue: To know, is to know that you know nothing. That is the meaning of true knowledge

Quote.Author: Socrates
Quote.QuoteValue: From the deepest desires often come the deadliest hate

Quote.Author: Socrates
Quote.QuoteValue: The unexamined life is not worth living

Quote.Author: Socrates
Quote.QuoteValue: He is richest who is content with the least, for content is the wealth of nature

Quote.Author: Socrates
Quote.QuoteValue: An honest man is always a child

Quote.Author: Socrates
Quote.QuoteValue: Be slow to fall into friendship; but when thou art in, continue firm and constant

Quote.Author: Soren Kierkegaard
Quote.QuoteValue: Prayer does not change God, but it changes him who prays

Quote.Author: Soren Kierkegaard
Quote.QuoteValue: Life can only be understood backwards; but it must be lived forwards

Quote.Author: Soren Kierkegaard
Quote.QuoteValue: Face the facts of being what you are, for that is what changes what you are

Quote.Author: Soren Kierkegaard
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is not a problem to be solved, but a reality to be experienced

Quote.Author: Soren Kierkegaard
Quote.QuoteValue: People demand freedom of speech as a compensation for the freedom of thought which they seldom use

Quote.Author: Soren Kierkegaard
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't forget to love yourself

Quote.Author: Soren Kierkegaard
Quote.QuoteValue: Our life always expresses the result of our dominant thoughts

Quote.Author: Soren Kierkegaard
Quote.QuoteValue: The tyrant dies and his rule is over, the martyr dies and his rule begins

Quote.Author: Soren Kierkegaard
Quote.QuoteValue: Patience is necessary, and one cannot reap immediately where one has sown

Quote.Author: Soren Kierkegaard
Quote.QuoteValue: Boredom is the root of all evil - the despairing refusal to be oneself

Quote.Author: Stanley Kubrick
Quote.QuoteValue: Art consists of reshaping life, but it does not create life nor cause life

Quote.Author: Stanley Kubrick
Quote.QuoteValue: When a man cannot choose, he ceases to be a man

Quote.Author: Stanley Kubrick
Quote.QuoteValue: You're an idealist, and I pity you as I would the village idiot

Quote.Author: Stanley Kubrick
Quote.QuoteValue: The great nations have always acted like gangsters, and the small nations like prostitutes

Quote.Author: Stanley Kubrick
Quote.QuoteValue: It's a mistake to confuse pity with love

Quote.Author: Stanley Kubrick
Quote.QuoteValue: If it can be written, or thought, it can be filmed

Quote.Author: Stanley Kubrick
Quote.QuoteValue: Here's to five miserable months on the wagon and the irreparable harm that it's caused me

Quote.Author: Stanley Kubrick
Quote.QuoteValue: There are few things more fundamentally encouraging and stimulating than seeing someone else die

Quote.Author: Stanley Kubrick
Quote.QuoteValue: A filmmaker has almost the same freedom as a novelist has when he buys himself some paper

Quote.Author: Stanley Kubrick
Quote.QuoteValue: What do you take me for? A fourteen karat sucker?

Quote.Author: Stephen Covey
Quote.QuoteValue: The key is not to prioritize what's on your schedule, but to schedule your priorities

Quote.Author: Stephen Covey
Quote.QuoteValue: Listen with the intent to understand, not the intent to reply

Quote.Author: Stephen Covey
Quote.QuoteValue: There are three constants in life... change, choice and principles

Quote.Author: Stephen Covey
Quote.QuoteValue: Listen with your eyes for feelings

Quote.Author: Stephen Covey
Quote.QuoteValue: Accountability breeds response-ability

Quote.Author: Stephen Covey
Quote.QuoteValue: Stop setting goals. Goals are pure fantasy unless you have a specific plan to achieve them

Quote.Author: Stephen Covey
Quote.QuoteValue: Your most important work is always ahead of you, never behind you

Quote.Author: Stephen Covey
Quote.QuoteValue: If we keep doing what we're doing, we're going to keep getting what we're getting

Quote.Author: Stephen Covey
Quote.QuoteValue: The true identity theft is not financial. It's not in cyberspace. It's spiritual. It's been taken

Quote.Author: Stephen Covey
Quote.QuoteValue: Strength lies in differences, not in similarities

Quote.Author: Stephen Hawking
Quote.QuoteValue: Intelligence is the ability to adapt to change

Quote.Author: Stephen Hawking
Quote.QuoteValue: People won't have time for you if you are always angry or complaining

Quote.Author: Stephen Hawking
Quote.QuoteValue: However difficult life may seem, there is always something you can do and succeed at

Quote.Author: Stephen Hawking
Quote.QuoteValue: Science is not only a disciple of reason but, also, one of romance and passion

Quote.Author: Stephen Hawking
Quote.QuoteValue: We are all now connected by the Internet, like neurons in a giant brain

Quote.Author: Stephen Hawking
Quote.QuoteValue: Work gives you meaning and purpose and life is empty without it

Quote.Author: Stephen Hawking
Quote.QuoteValue: Life would be tragic if it weren't funny

Quote.Author: Stephen Hawking
Quote.QuoteValue: One can't predict the weather more than a few days in advance

Quote.Author: Stephen Hawking
Quote.QuoteValue: If I had to choose a superhero to be, I would pick Superman. He's everything that I'm not

Quote.Author: Stephen Hawking
Quote.QuoteValue: Because there is a law such as gravity, the universe can and will create itself from nothing

Quote.Author: Stephen King
Quote.QuoteValue: The trust of the innocent is the liar's most useful tool

Quote.Author: Stephen King
Quote.QuoteValue: Monsters are real, and ghosts are real too. They live inside us, and sometimes, they win

Quote.Author: Stephen King
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is like a wheel. Sooner or later, it always come around to where you started again

Quote.Author: Stephen King
Quote.QuoteValue: French is the language that turns dirt into romance

Quote.Author: Stephen King
Quote.QuoteValue: If you don't have the time to read, you don't have the time or the tools to write

Quote.Author: Stephen King
Quote.QuoteValue: I am the literary equivalent of a Big Mac and fries

Quote.Author: Stephen King
Quote.QuoteValue: We make up horrors to help us cope with the real ones

Quote.Author: Stephen King
Quote.QuoteValue: I love crime, I love mysteries, and I love ghosts

Quote.Author: Stephen King
Quote.QuoteValue: Fiction is the truth inside the lie

Quote.Author: Stephen King
Quote.QuoteValue: God is cruel. Sometimes he makes you live

Quote.Author: Steve Jobs
Quote.QuoteValue: Great things in business are never done by one person. They're done by a team of people

Quote.Author: Steve Jobs
Quote.QuoteValue: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower

Quote.Author: Steve Jobs
Quote.QuoteValue: Be a yardstick of quality. Some people aren't used to an environment where excellence is expected

Quote.Author: Steve Jobs
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes life hits you in the head with a brick. Don't lose faith

Quote.Author: Steve Jobs
Quote.QuoteValue: Design is not just what it looks like and feels like. Design is how it works

Quote.Author: Steve Jobs
Quote.QuoteValue: Stay hungry, stay foolish

Quote.Author: Steve Jobs
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe life is an intelligent thing: that things aren't random

Quote.Author: Steve Jobs
Quote.QuoteValue: It's not a faith in technology. It's faith in people

Quote.Author: Steve Jobs
Quote.QuoteValue: Older people sit down and ask, 'What is it?' but the boy asks, 'What can I do with it?'

Quote.Author: Steve Jobs
Quote.QuoteValue: Things don't have to change the world to be important

Quote.Author: Steven Wright
Quote.QuoteValue: Whenever I think of the past, it brings back so many memories

Quote.Author: Steven Wright
Quote.QuoteValue: Everywhere is within walking distance if you have the time

Quote.Author: Steven Wright
Quote.QuoteValue: There's a fine line between fishing and just standing on the shore like an idiot

Quote.Author: Steven Wright
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm writing a book. I've got the page numbers done

Quote.Author: Steven Wright
Quote.QuoteValue: A lot of people are afraid of heights. Not me, I'm afraid of widths

Quote.Author: Steven Wright
Quote.QuoteValue: I think it's wrong that only one company makes the game Monopoly

Quote.Author: Steven Wright
Quote.QuoteValue: I intend to live forever. So far, so good

Quote.Author: Steven Wright
Quote.QuoteValue: I busted a mirror and got seven years bad luck, but my lawyer thinks he can get me five

Quote.Author: Steven Wright
Quote.QuoteValue: My friend has a baby. I'm recording all the noises he makes so later I can ask him what he meant

Quote.Author: Steven Wright
Quote.QuoteValue: I was trying to daydream, but my mind kept wandering

Quote.Author: Sun Tzu
Quote.QuoteValue: The supreme art of war is to subdue the enemy without fighting

Quote.Author: Sun Tzu
Quote.QuoteValue: Know thy self, know thy enemy. A thousand battles, a thousand victories

Quote.Author: Sun Tzu
Quote.QuoteValue: If you know the enemy and know yourself you need not fear the results of a hundred battles

Quote.Author: Sun Tzu
Quote.QuoteValue: He will win who knows when to fight and when not to fight

Quote.Author: Sun Tzu
Quote.QuoteValue: Know your enemy and know yourself and you can fight a hundred battles without disaster

Quote.Author: Sun Tzu
Quote.QuoteValue: Invincibility lies in the defence; the possibility of victory in the attack

Quote.Author: Sun Tzu
Quote.QuoteValue: Pretend inferiority and encourage his arrogance

Quote.Author: Sun Tzu
Quote.QuoteValue: If your opponent is of choleric temper, irritate him

Quote.Author: Sun Tzu
Quote.QuoteValue: Victory usually goes to the army who has better trained officers and men

Quote.Author: Sun Tzu
Quote.QuoteValue: A good commander is benevolent and unconcerned with fame

Quote.Author: Sylvia Plath
Quote.QuoteValue: Kiss me and you will see how important I am

Quote.Author: Sylvia Plath
Quote.QuoteValue: I took a deep breath and listened to the old bray of my heart. I am. I am. I am

Quote.Author: Sylvia Plath
Quote.QuoteValue: If you expect nothing from anybody, you're never disappointed

Quote.Author: Sylvia Plath
Quote.QuoteValue: How frail the human heart must be - a mirrored pool of thought

Quote.Author: Sylvia Plath
Quote.QuoteValue: Indecision and reveries are the anesthetics of constructive action

Quote.Author: Sylvia Plath
Quote.QuoteValue: But life is long. And it is the long run that balances the short flare of interest and passion

Quote.Author: Sylvia Plath
Quote.QuoteValue: How we need another soul to cling to

Quote.Author: Sylvia Plath
Quote.QuoteValue: When you are insane, you are busy being insane - all the time

Quote.Author: Sylvia Plath
Quote.QuoteValue: I am too pure for you or anyone

Quote.Author: Sylvia Plath
Quote.QuoteValue: There must be quite a few things a hot bath won't cure, but I don't know many of them

Quote.Author: T. S. Eliot
Quote.QuoteValue: Only those who will risk going too far can possibly find out how far one can go

Quote.Author: T. S. Eliot
Quote.QuoteValue: I said to my soul, be still, and wait without hope, For hope would be hope for the wrong thing

Quote.Author: T. S. Eliot
Quote.QuoteValue: So the darkness shall be the light, and the stillness the dancing

Quote.Author: T. S. Eliot
Quote.QuoteValue: Home is where one starts from

Quote.Author: T. S. Eliot
Quote.QuoteValue: Where is all the knowledge we lost with information?

Quote.Author: T. S. Eliot
Quote.QuoteValue: If you aren't in over your head, how do you know how tall you are?

Quote.Author: T. S. Eliot
Quote.QuoteValue: This is the way the world ends, not with a bang, but a whimper

Quote.Author: T. S. Eliot
Quote.QuoteValue: People to whom nothing has ever happened cannot understand the unimportance of events

Quote.Author: T. S. Eliot
Quote.QuoteValue: Anxiety is the hand maiden of creativity

Quote.Author: T. S. Eliot
Quote.QuoteValue: I will show you fear in a handful of dust

Quote.Author: Taylor Swift
Quote.QuoteValue: We don't need to share the same opinions as others, but we need to be respectful

Quote.Author: Taylor Swift
Quote.QuoteValue: My ultimate goal is to end up being happy. Most of the time

Quote.Author: Taylor Swift
Quote.QuoteValue: In a relationship each person should support the other; they should lift each other up

Quote.Author: Taylor Swift
Quote.QuoteValue: I love making new friends and I respect people for a lot of different reasons

Quote.Author: Taylor Swift
Quote.QuoteValue: Faith Hill is a big role model

Quote.Author: Taylor Swift
Quote.QuoteValue: I think about food literally all day every day. It's a thing

Quote.Author: Taylor Swift
Quote.QuoteValue: Anytime someone tells me that I can't do something, I want to do it more

Quote.Author: Taylor Swift
Quote.QuoteValue: I have this really high priority on happiness and finding something to be happy about

Quote.Author: Taylor Swift
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always strived to be successful, not famous

Quote.Author: Taylor Swift
Quote.QuoteValue: There are no rules when it comes to love

Quote.Author: Theodore Roosevelt
Quote.QuoteValue: Keep your eyes on the stars, and your feet on the ground

Quote.Author: Theodore Roosevelt
Quote.QuoteValue: Believe you can and you're halfway there

Quote.Author: Theodore Roosevelt
Quote.QuoteValue: People ask the difference between a leader and a boss. The leader leads, and the boss drives

Quote.Author: Theodore Roosevelt
Quote.QuoteValue: Great thoughts speak only to the thoughtful mind, but great actions speak to all mankind

Quote.Author: Theodore Roosevelt
Quote.QuoteValue: Nobody cares how much you know, until they know how much you care

Quote.Author: Theodore Roosevelt
Quote.QuoteValue: Far and away the best prize that life has to offer is the chance to work hard at work worth doing

Quote.Author: Theodore Roosevelt
Quote.QuoteValue: With self-discipline most anything is possible

Quote.Author: Theodore Roosevelt
Quote.QuoteValue: A thorough knowledge of the Bible is worth more than a college education

Quote.Author: Theodore Roosevelt
Quote.QuoteValue: To educate a man in mind and not in morals is to educate a menace to society

Quote.Author: Theodore Roosevelt
Quote.QuoteValue: The only man who never makes a mistake is the man who never does anything

Quote.Author: Thich Nhat Hanh
Quote.QuoteValue: Because of your smile, you make life more beautiful

Quote.Author: Thich Nhat Hanh
Quote.QuoteValue: Let us fill our hearts with our own compassion - towards ourselves and towards all living beings

Quote.Author: Thich Nhat Hanh
Quote.QuoteValue: Every breath we take, every step we make, can be filled with peace, joy and serenity

Quote.Author: Thich Nhat Hanh
Quote.QuoteValue: Many people are alive but don't touch the miracle of being alive

Quote.Author: Thich Nhat Hanh
Quote.QuoteValue: Fearlessness is not only possible, it is the ultimate joy. When you touch nonfear, you are free

Quote.Author: Thich Nhat Hanh
Quote.QuoteValue: We have more possibilities available in each moment than we realize

Quote.Author: Thich Nhat Hanh
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no way to happiness - happiness is the way

Quote.Author: Thich Nhat Hanh
Quote.QuoteValue: Listening to and understanding our inner sufferings will resolve most of the problems we encounter

Quote.Author: Thich Nhat Hanh
Quote.QuoteValue: Every thought you produce, anything you say, any action you do, it bears your signature

Quote.Author: Thich Nhat Hanh
Quote.QuoteValue: Mother Earth is very talented. She has produced Buddhas, bodhisattvas, great beings

Quote.Author: Thomas A. Edison
Quote.QuoteValue: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work

Quote.Author: Thomas A. Edison
Quote.QuoteValue: Opportunity is missed by most people because it is dressed in overalls and looks like work

Quote.Author: Thomas A. Edison
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no substitute for hard work

Quote.Author: Thomas A. Edison
Quote.QuoteValue: There's a way to do it better - find it

Quote.Author: Thomas A. Edison
Quote.QuoteValue: If we did all the things we are capable of, we would literally astound ourselves

Quote.Author: Thomas A. Edison
Quote.QuoteValue: Genius is one percent inspiration and ninety-nine percent perspiration

Quote.Author: Thomas A. Edison
Quote.QuoteValue: What you are will show in what you do

Quote.Author: Thomas A. Edison
Quote.QuoteValue: Just because something doesn't do what you planned it to do doesn't mean it's useless

Quote.Author: Thomas A. Edison
Quote.QuoteValue: I never did a day's work in my life. It was all fun

Quote.Author: Thomas A. Edison
Quote.QuoteValue: To have a great idea, have a lot of them

Quote.Author: Thomas Aquinas
Quote.QuoteValue: There is nothing on this earth more to be prized than true friendship

Quote.Author: Thomas Aquinas
Quote.QuoteValue: The things that we love tell us what we are

Quote.Author: Thomas Aquinas
Quote.QuoteValue: If the highest aim of a captain were to preserve his ship, he would keep it in port forever

Quote.Author: Thomas Aquinas
Quote.QuoteValue: Sorrow can be alleviated by good sleep, a bath and a glass of wine

Quote.Author: Thomas Aquinas
Quote.QuoteValue: Well-ordered self-love is right and natural

Quote.Author: Thomas Aquinas
Quote.QuoteValue: Good can exist without evil, whereas evil cannot exist without good

Quote.Author: Thomas Aquinas
Quote.QuoteValue: Human salvation demands the divine disclosure of truths surpassing reason

Quote.Author: Thomas Aquinas
Quote.QuoteValue: By nature all men are equal in liberty, but not in other endowments

Quote.Author: Thomas Aquinas
Quote.QuoteValue: Love takes up where knowledge leaves off

Quote.Author: Thomas Aquinas
Quote.QuoteValue: Happiness is secured through virtue; it is a good attained by man's own will

Quote.Author: Thomas Carlyle
Quote.QuoteValue: He who has health, has hope; and he who has hope, has everything

Quote.Author: Thomas Carlyle
Quote.QuoteValue: Love is not altogether a delirium, yet it has many points in common therewith

Quote.Author: Thomas Carlyle
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing builds self-esteem and self-confidence like accomplishment

Quote.Author: Thomas Carlyle
Quote.QuoteValue: Silence is as deep as eternity, speech a shallow as time

Quote.Author: Thomas Carlyle
Quote.QuoteValue: No great man lives in vain. The history of the world is but the biography of great men

Quote.Author: Thomas Carlyle
Quote.QuoteValue: There are good and bad times, but our mood changes more often than our fortune

Quote.Author: Thomas Carlyle
Quote.QuoteValue: Not what I have, but what I do is my kingdom

Quote.Author: Thomas Carlyle
Quote.QuoteValue: Our main business is not to see what lies dimly at a distance, but to do what lies clearly at hand

Quote.Author: Thomas Carlyle
Quote.QuoteValue: Isolation is the sum total of wretchedness to a man

Quote.Author: Thomas Carlyle
Quote.QuoteValue: In every phenomenon the beginning remains always the most notable moment

Quote.Author: Thomas Jefferson
Quote.QuoteValue: Honesty is the first chapter in the book of wisdom

Quote.Author: Thomas Jefferson
Quote.QuoteValue: Do you want to know who you are? Don't ask. Act! Action will delineate and define you

Quote.Author: Thomas Jefferson
Quote.QuoteValue: The tree of liberty must be refreshed from time to time with the blood of patriots and tyrants

Quote.Author: Thomas Jefferson
Quote.QuoteValue: In matters of style, swim with the current; in matters of principle, stand like a rock

Quote.Author: Thomas Jefferson
Quote.QuoteValue: I like the dreams of the future better than the history of the past

Quote.Author: Thomas Jefferson
Quote.QuoteValue: Walking is the best possible exercise. Habituate yourself to walk very far

Quote.Author: Thomas Jefferson
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe that every human mind feels pleasure in doing good to another

Quote.Author: Thomas Jefferson
Quote.QuoteValue: Never spend your money before you have earned it

Quote.Author: Thomas Jefferson
Quote.QuoteValue: One travels more usefully when alone, because he reflects more

Quote.Author: Thomas Jefferson
Quote.QuoteValue: I tremble for my country when I reflect that God is just; that his justice cannot sleep forever

Quote.Author: Thomas Merton
Quote.QuoteValue: Happiness is not a matter of intensity but of balance, order, rhythm and harmony

Quote.Author: Thomas Merton
Quote.QuoteValue: Every moment and every event of every man's life on earth plants something in his soul

Quote.Author: Thomas Merton
Quote.QuoteValue: Pride makes us artificial and humility makes us real

Quote.Author: Thomas Merton
Quote.QuoteValue: Perhaps I am stronger than I think

Quote.Author: Thomas Merton
Quote.QuoteValue: Art enables us to find ourselves and lose ourselves at the same time
